price: Ɛberε a ͻsεeε bεba ne so no, n’agyapadeε no ho mma mfasoͻ mma no.
arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā yugh'nī ʿanhu māluhu idhā taraddā
